description: Acquisition of  bags of 1000 kg of Sodium Formate
duration_in_months: There is no expected duration specified in this contract.
full_summary:
**Title**: Purchase of Bags of Formate for YBX, YGR, YGV, and Sept-Iles
================================================ilmingtonVertical Gradient WGstarting Line Span⇓

**Reference Number**: WS3779269503
---------------

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
------------------------------------

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
---------------------------------------------

**Bid Solicitation Description**: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes a previous solicitation dated December 8, 2022 with a closing date of December 19, 2022 at 2:00 pm EST. All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2:00 pm EST on December 19, 2022. Failure to meet this deadline will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

**Request for Proposal**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Transport Canada is issuing a REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the acquisition of bags of 1000 kg of sodium formate. The goods are required for locations in YBX, YGR, YGV, and Sept-Iles, Quebec, Canada. The RFP outlines the specific requirements and procurement procedures for the acquisition of the goods.

**Requirements and Conditions**: The RFP includes detailed specifications and requirements for the acquisition of the goods, including packaging, labeling, and documentation. Bidders are required to ensure that their bid submissions meet all the requirements outlined in the RFP.

**Trade Agreements**: This procurement is subject to trade agreements between Canada and several countries, including Colombia, Korea, Mexico, Peru, Panama, Honduras, Chile, and the United States.

**Contact Information**: For further information, please contact Sonia Langis, PWGSC/PSPC, at sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL**: The complete bid solicitation document is available on Ariba's Discovery Platform.
